timeline.message: CMTS-68: DataWeaveExpressionLanguage should be loaded lazily when DeclarationSession is deployed

timeline.bodyText: This is API, I would not remove it
timeline.author: lucianoRM

replies.bodyText: I have added that in a previous commit, so, it was not released yet. It has been part of a timestamp based build but not yet released. Those are internal "releases" that we have been doing for validating the changes on master.
replies.author: gsfernandes

replies.bodyText: Ok, I did not know that.
replies.author: lucianoRM
